messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] NHK
messages.msgSnippet: As I ve gotten a bunch of actors interviews and behind the scenes stuff collections, I ll try to give those translations as possible as I could. However I ll
messages.messageBody:
As I've gotten a bunch of actors interviews and behind the scenes stuff
collections, I'll try to give those translations as possible as I could.
However I'll try to make it not incline toward my favorite characters,
so you can make request posting here if you have some particular
characters (or may be topics) you are interested in.
All suggestion are welcome.

Tama

messages.subject: NHK
messages.msgSnippet: Tonight is the last episode of Shinsengumi! and I think I ll soon be re-doing our NHK page for the website. I know a bunch of you have been watching the
messages.messageBody:
Tonight is the last episode of Shinsengumi! and I think I'll soon be
re-doing our NHK page for the website. I know a bunch of you have been
watching the subtitled episodes available so come on and toss in your
commentary on the show, the characters/actor portrayals anything.

My regular emial is actin gup so send your comments and how you'd like
to be credited to me at: bsher213@...

Barbara Sheridan
